duties_responsibilities.duty: Build year-round client relationships and provide tax preparation, tax audit support and tax planning year-round.
Create confidence in clients by conducting tax interviews face to face and through virtual tools (video conferencing, phone, chat, email).
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Grow tax expertise and effectively communicate in person and virtually.
Complete the H&R Block Tax Knowledge Assessment and meet all IRS and state requirements.
Conduct virtual tax interviews and provide tax planning and audit support.
Stay updated with tax laws and regulations through ongoing education.
Collaborate with colleagues to foster a supportive and connected work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field. CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred.
